original_text: They must work on behalf of the Israelites. They must take care of the things that are in the Tent of Meeting. That is how they will serve God.
korean_text: 곧 회막의 모든 기구를 맡아 지키며 이스라엘 자손의 직무를 위하여 성막에서 시무할지니

sentences.original_text: They must work on behalf of the Israelites.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 사람들을 대신하여 일해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They must take care of the things
that are in the Tent of Meeting.
That is how they will serve God.
